trans-unit.source: Enable the classic Page module:Check this box to enable classic Page module in the list of modules.
Enable Header for FCE's:If this checkbox is checked the header of Content Element type FCE will be rendered like headers of other Content Elements.

Defines the XML indentation in the Data Structures.:This is usefull for static Data Structures. Number smaller then zero means no indentation, zero means using tabs and number larger then zero means number of space chars.
Enable static files for data structures:Experimental! Use Static DS Conversion Wizard below!
FCE Data Structure Path:Path to the static data structures for flexible content elements
Page Data Structure Path:Path to the static data structures for pages
